radiographic_examinations.findings: The lung bases are clear and the heart size is normal. The liver is diffusely fatty. The gallbladder, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, stomach are grossly normal. Focal thickening of the sigmoid, with fatty stranding and localized air bubbles within the mesentery. Scattered small nodes are not enlarged by CT size criteria. No large amount of free intraperitoneal air. No drainable abscess or intra-abdominal free fluid. Scattered diverticulosis is noted throughout the descending colon.
